definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: moan, growl, utter, speak, muse (only poet.) (onomatop.; NH [[הָגׇה]] muse, speak, spell a word, so Aram. [[הֲגׇא]]; hgo0 muse, esp. Ethpa.; Ar. haja0 satirize, insult, scold, also spell (borrowed mng.))—

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: growl, of lion growling over prey, sq. [[על]] Is 31:4.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: groan, moan, in distress (like dove), abs., Is 38:14, Is 59:11 ([[הָגוֹ נֶהְגֶּה]]); sigh for ([[לְ]]) in sorrow, mourning, moan for Is 16:7 (‖[[יְיֵלִיל לְ]]), so also Je 48:31.
utter, sq. acc. rei, Ps 38:13; subj. [[לָשׁוֹן]] Job 27:4 (‖[[דִּבֶּר]]) Ps 35:28, Ps 71:24, Is 59:3; subj. [[פֶּה]] Ps 37:30, Pr 8:7—cf. also sub

definitions.title: 3. a.
definitions.body: (soliloquize) meditate, muse, c. [[בְּ]] rei, Jos 1:8, Ps 1:2, Ps 63:7, Ps 77:13, Ps 143:5; c. acc. Is 33:18, subj. [[לֵב]].

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: imagine, devise, c. acc. Ps 2:1, Pr 24:2 (subj. [[לֵב]]); c. Inf. Pr 15:28 (subj. id.)

definitions.title: Po.
definitions.body: Inf. abs. only [[הׂרוֹ וְהׂגוֹ מִלֵּב]] [[דִּבְרֵי־שֶׁקֶר]] Is 59:13 a conceiving and an uttering, out of the heart, lying words (‖[[דַּבֵּר עשֶׁק וְסָרָה]]);—on form cf. Kö:i. 555; but rd. rather [[הָרוֹ וְהָנוֹ]]

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Inf. abs. cf. Di; Ba:NB 77 retains MT & expl. as Qal Inf. pass.

definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: Pt. pl. [[גּים]]—[[וְהַמַּהְִ]] [[הַמְּחַפְחְפִים]] Is 8:19 those that make chirpings and mutterings, of necromancers and wizards.
